metadata.title: CVE-2024-25710 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description: Loop with Unreachable Exit Condition ('Infinite Loop') vulnerability inApache Commons Compress.This issue affects Apache Commons Compress: from1.3 through 1.25.0. Users are recommended to upgrade to version 1.26.0which fixes the issue.

criterions.comment: libcommons-compress-java package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
